data.text: Masa gila ka wuzeɠe,
Ti ɠilagilagi ta ɠɛ eɠɛ
Naazu zɔiti ti-ɠaazuʋɛ maanɛɛni é wozaɠaa,
Kidafaawulala nuiti ta faa ɠaaɠa,
Ɠimalala nui la mɔ zooga é ʋa leve ga seizumaanɛ kɛʋele,
Ɠimalala nui ɠa ɗa ɠimalala vai nɔ wo.
Yaava nui ná-kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔlaiti ɲɔuʋɛ.
Kɛlɛ nui zii ʋagai,
Ee, anzanuiti, wɔiti ziizoolɛ la wo ma,
Kona gila ta tago laawu,
À ɓali ga duai, ziizoolɛlala nuiti,
À yiila loɠa, wo wɔlɔ ɓalaɠa ʋapagiti faa zu,
Wo wɔlɔ nà-nuɓusɛiti ta-yooi vaa zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ masa pɛlɛi zuwoga, taai daaveni suwoga,
Toɠa ɠɛ ɠana,
Sɔledai ɠa ɠɛ teʋebai zu,
Telebodai ma lɔnɔgi ɠa ɠɛ ga ziilɛigi,
Nà-nuɓusɛiti ta ta-eteai ziɛ ziilɛigi zu,
Sakɔtui ɠa dɔɓɔi loo bu,
Kɛlɛ wa ɠɛ ga undaanɛ nuiti,
